mama jyothishaya wishwasa karanawa.habayi yanthara damima wage dewal nam kisisethma wishwasa karanne naha.habayi ithin mama eeka hela dakinneth naha.mokada api mehema hithamuko,yamek thamage diyunuwa wadi wenna kiya yantharayak damma kiya.mema yantharaya damimen labena manasika uththejanaya nisa ohuta wadipura unanduwak aathiwiya hakiyi.eya diyunuwata hethu wenawane.oba ihatha sadahan kara thibenawa wishrama giya piris jyothishaya hadarimata pelabenawa kiya.eyata nam mamath ekaga wenawa.namuth mehema karunak thiyenawa,boho denek tharuna jyothishayawidin lagata yamata pakilenawa.eyata hethuwa nam owun sithanne tharuna jyothishayawedinta etharam danumak nathayi kiya sithimayi.namuth piligath rakiyawak kota wishrama gath kenek jyothishaya karanawita senaga wala nokadi paminenawa.

lowa pura mema wagawan wyaptha kirima sadaha 1985 saha 1996 kalaya thula kuda saha madhyama pramanaye gowipalawal 9,41,000ka jiwath wu gowihu laksha 53k siya gowi bim walin balahathkarayen iwath kara thibe.lowata da, apata da, meya aluth thathwayak nowa namuth parani gataluma aluth lesa apata nawatha paminemin athi bawa apa awabodha karagatha yuthuya.
